title: Obatzter (cheese spread)

ingredients.content: 30 g spring onion/shallot, trimmed and cut into halves
200 g Camembert cheese, softened and rind removed (see Tips)
150 g ricotta cheese, well drained (see Tips)

preparations.content: Place spring onions/shallots into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add Camembert, ricotta, caraway seeds, paprika, salt and pepper and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>, or until all ingredients are combined.
Transfer into a serving bowl and garnish with chopped chives before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with pretzels, bagels or toast.
Look for Camembert with a higher fat content, as this will produce a smoother consistency.
Obatzter is a classic spread in Germany. A dash of beer or white wine can be added in step 2 to taste.
You can substitute the ricotta cheese with quark.
